name: European Wax Center - Mobile
description: Offers a variety of waxing services for men and women, including Brazilian, eyebrow, bikini, and full-body waxing. They emphasize an inclusive environment and offer "Wax Pass" options for savings

name: The Retreat Day Spa
address: 3920 Crosshaven Drive, Suite 100, Vestavia Hills, AL 35243
description: Provides gentle full-body waxing for all skin types using NuFree Nudesse, a non-irritating botanical alternative to wax. Services include legs, arms, underarms, bikini, Brazilian, back, chest, and face waxing

name: Bare aEsthetics
address: 4318 Downtowner Loop N. Suite T, Mobile, AL 36613
description: Award-winning salon known for its "Hoo-Ha Waxer." They offer a full range of skincare needs and are noted for providing male Brazilian waxing. They are open by appointment Monday-Friday

name: Lush MedSpa Tuscaloosa
address: (Specific address not readily available, but located in Tuscaloosa, AL)
description: Offers various waxing services including bikini, face, and Brazilian treatments, promising smoother skin for three to six weeks

name: éLevé Spa - Hard Waxing
address: (Specific address not readily available, but located in Auburn, AL)
description: Specializes in hard waxing services, including full-body and facial waxing, and Brazilian waxes. They utilize hard wax for comfort and offer services for both men and women

name: Terramé Salon & Spa
address: (Specific address not readily available, but located in Huntsville, AL)
description: Offers a variety of waxing services to remove unwanted hair, leaving skin exfoliated, smooth, and hydrated. Services include facial, body, and bikini waxing

name: Cabana Wax
address: (Specific address not readily available, but located in Huntsville, AL)

name: Brazilian Wax Spa by Marci

name: Hand & Stone Massage and Facial Spa

name: European Wax Center - Huntsville
